overview: Bela, reared by Indians, learns that she is a white orphan and runs away from the Indian village to avoid marrying a brave from the tribe. She determines to marry land prospector Sam Gladding, who resists her advances but later falls in love with Bela when an Indian sage gives him some advice.
tagline: She wanted a husband, so she kidnapped a man! A rollicking tale of a feminine go-getter and her relentless man hunt.
title: The Huntress
